if.if:
tms.xtmst_loadorder ld.LoadOrderID='%{uv_freightloadunloadop_vLst[OpOrderID]}' UPDATE tms.xtmst_loadorder ld JOIN tms.xtmst_loadorderdetail ldd ON ld.LoadOrderID=ldd.LoadOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_dispatchplan dp ON ld.VehicleRealTimeID=dp.VehicleRealTimeID AND dp.FreightID=ldd.FreightID JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON f.FreightID=dp.FreightID left JOIN tms.xtmst_pickuporder pk ON f.PickupOrderID=pk.PickupOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclesituation vs ON vs.VehicleRealTimeID=ld.VehicleRealTimeID AND vs.CityID=ld.LoadCityID AND vs.Address=ld.LoadAddress JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime vrt ON ld.VehicleRealTimeID=vrt.VehicleRealTimeID SET ld.Status=603,dp.Status=302,f.STATUS=if(f.ConsignmentMode=1001,if(f.DeliveryMethod=1213 or f.DeliveryMethod=1214,206,if(f.FromXSiteID=dp.FromXSiteID,207,if(dp.ToXSiteID is null ,211,212))),if(f.ConsignmentMode=1002,205,206)) WHERE %{WHERE}; set @vrtid=null;select VehicleRealTimeID into @vrtid from %{table} ld where %{where}; ,pk.OrderSTATUS=106
tms.xtmst_unloadorder uld.unLoadOrderID='%{uv_freightloadunloadop_vLst[OpOrderID]}' UPDATE tms.xtmst_unloadorder uld JOIN tms.xtmst_unloadorderdetail uldd ON uld.unLoadOrderID=uldd.unLoadOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_dispatchplan dp ON uld.VehicleRealTimeID=dp.VehicleRealTimeID AND dp.FreightID=uldd.FreightID JOIN tms.xtmst_freight f ON f.FreightID=dp.FreightID left JOIN tms.xtmst_pickuporder pk ON f.PickupOrderID=pk.PickupOrderID JOIN tms.xtmst_vehiclesituation vs ON vs.VehicleRealTimeID=uld.VehicleRealTimeID AND vs.CityID=uld.unLoadCityID AND vs.Address=uld.unLoadAddress SET uld.Status=603,dp.Status=303,f.STATUS=if(f.ConsignmentMode=1001,if(f.DeliveryMethod=1211,if(f.ToXSiteID=dp.ToXSiteID,208,210),if(f.DeliveryMethod=1212,if(f.ConsigneeAddress=dp.ToAddress,214,if(f.ToXSiteID=dp.ToXSiteID,209,210)),214)),if(f.ConsignmentMode=1002,205,214)) WHERE %{WHERE}; set @vrtid=null;select VehicleRealTimeID into @vrtid from %{table} uld where %{where}; ,vrt.Status=404,pk.orderSTATUS=IF(f.FreightType=1200,104,107)
